DTZ.ApartmentKey.Name: Zuzu Apartment Key
DTZ.ApartmentKey.Description: This key lets you into your apartment (Apartment 1D) in Zuzu City.

DTZ.ConstructionPermit.Name: Zuzu Construction Permit
DTZ.ConstructionPermit.Description: This permit, issued by the Zuzu City District Council Board of Permits, allows you to build and renovate certain structures in Zuzu City and the surrounding Zuzu District.

Entries.{{ModId}}_PassOutInZuzu_Billed: To whom it may concern,^Joja Subteam-55B of the Zuzu City District were on their nightly patrol of the city when you were spotted unconscious by the road.^You're lucky they found you. You have been charged a fee for this service.^Be careful!  ^   -Joja Corp.
Entries.{{ModId}}_PassOutInZuzu_NotBilled: I found you by the roadside in Zuzu City.^You should really be more careful. A kind stranger in a suit helped me get you home.
Entries.{{ModId}}_PassOutInKahuna_Billed: To whom it may concern,^Joja Subteam-56C of the Kahuna District were on their nightly patrol of the island when you were spotted unconscious by the sea.^You're lucky they found you. You have been charged a fee for this service.^Be careful!  ^   -Joja Corp.
Entries.{{ModId}}_PassOutInKahuna_NotBilled: I saw you last night, you were face down in the sand at the Kahuna Resort.^Some Air Ambulance came and got you and then flew you home. Luckily, some stranger footed the bill.

{{ModId}}_Obelisk.Name: Zuzu Obelisk
{{ModId}}_Obelisk.Description: Warps you to Downtown Zuzu City.

Entries.DTZ.ApartmentLobby.1: Bark, bark bark! (Xena is happy to see you).
Entries.DTZ.ApartmentLobby.2: It's a nice little cozy area for reading.
Entries.DTZ.ApartmentLobby.3: You attempt to call the elevator but nothing happens; it's out of order.
Entries.DTZ.ApartmentLobby.5: The door is locked, but a small note on the door reads 'FOR SALE. SEE RECEPTIONIST TO BUY.'
Entries.DTZ.Apartment1a.1: It's a bookshelf. The books are all strange.
Entries.DTZ.Apartment1a.2: A book sits on the end table. The book seems to be a travel guide.
Entries.DTZ.Apartment1a.3: The small TV is playing some old show.
Entries.DTZ.Apartment1a.4: Hey, this clock is actually ticking!
Entries.DTZ.Apartment1a.5: It's a picture of Cal, Emerald and Gwen
Entries.DTZ.Apartment1a.6: The bin is practically empty, bar a few wrappers.
Entries.DTZ.Apartment1a.8: The TV is not turned on.
Entries.DTZ.Apartment1a.9: This is quite a big speaker!
Entries.DTZ.Apartment1a.10: 'Conventions of Art' The book is to do with different art techniques.
Entries.DTZ.Apartment1a.11: 'How to be a Good Employee' By Kristoff Joja.
Entries.DTZ.Apartment1a.12: The bin has a few cardboard food boxes in it.
Entries.DTZ.Apartment1a.13: The fridge is full of food. You don't want to take any, though.
Entries.DTZ.Apartment1a.14: The cabinet contains ornate china plates and bowls.
Entries.DTZ.Apartment1a.15: It's an Employee of the Month award, signed K. Joja.
Entries.DTZ.Apartment1a.16: It's a photo of a red-headed Emerald. She's with her Mom.
Entries.DTZ.Apartment1a.18: It's a list of places in the local area: Calico Desert, Pine Mesa City, Zuzu City, Ridgeside Village, East Scarp, Pelican Town. Some of the places have been crossed out.
Entries.DTZ.Apartment1a.19: 'Long Lost Family: Stories of Family Reunions'
Entries.DTZ.Apartment1a.20: There's a bunch of crumpled up paper in the trash.
Entries.DTZ.Apartment1a.22: It's a coffee cup that still has coffee in it. It looks like its been here a while. Ew.
Entries.DTZ.Apartment1a.24: The room is trashed with paper - it looks like someone left in a hurry...
Entries.DTZ.FreewayTrans.3: ` Zuzu Desert and Sanctuary^> Downtown Zuzu City^@ Zuzu Forest
Entries.DTZ.ZuzuCity.1: Me and my son are just waiting for the bus, aren't we?
Entries.DTZ.ZuzuCity.3: The fence seems to be plastered with notes and posters.
Entries.DTZ.ZuzuCity.4: Dang, I'm still stuffed from that festival in Pelican Town...
Entries.DTZ.ZuzuCity.5: It's an abandoned Joja Mart shopping cart.
Entries.DTZ.ZuzuCity.6: ` Joja Mini Mart and Zuzu Apartments^@ Zuzu Desert and Sanctuary^> Crossroads
Entries.DTZ.ZuzuCity.7: It's a motorbike, parked on the sidewalk.
Entries.DTZ.ZuzuCity.8: It's some type of garage. It's probably the Joja Mini Mart Warehouse.
Entries.DTZ.ZuzuCity.10: It's a Joja Mart -- or rather, a Joja Mini.#It reminds you of Morris.
Entries.DTZ.ZuzuCity.11: The pizza place looks nice and warm inside.
Entries.DTZ.ZuzuCity.12: It's a generator, like the one outside Clint's. It seems to be turned off for now.
Entries.DTZ.ZuzuCity.13: "Here Lies S-1-m---m-y---y..."#That name makes no sense. The grave is all patchy and scratched.
Entries.DTZ.ZuzuCitySewerTunnel.1: It's a sword leant against a barrel.#The sword is too heavy to lift.
Entries.DTZ.ZuzuCitySewerTunnel.2: It's a barrel filled with a weirdly coloured powder.#You promptly close it.
Entries.DTZ.ZuzuCitySewerTunnel.3: A pile of Joja rubble blocks your path.
Entries.DTZ.Oasis.1: A few parked vehicles of Sanctuary patrons.
Entries.DTZ.Oasis.5: I'm just working here part time.#I need more gold for the Claw Machine!
Entries.DTZ.Oasis.6: Some cacti, they are very beautiful. Ouch!! I stuck my finger in, it hurts!
Entries.DTZ.Oasis.7: A lot of barrels of water, wine, Joja Cola and other liquids.
Entries.DTZ.Oasis.8: !DANGER! This cave is extremely dangerous and not to be entered by people unprepared. Only the bravest, strongest warriors should proceed. This is your warning.
Entries.DTZ.OasisCave.1: It looks like a snake statue.
Entries.DTZ.OasisCave.2: This barrel seems to be full of Joja Cola.
Entries.DTZ.OasisCave.3: The bones of an unknown creature.
Entries.DTZ.OasisCave.8: It is a fossil of an ancient creature.
Entries.DTZ.OasisCave.9: This vase is empty, but it looks very beautiful!...
Entries.DTZ.OasisCave.10: This is your LAST WARNING. We (The Adventurers Guild) cannot be responsible for what happens next...
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveB.1: There are several sparkling multicolored jars and with incredible designs, in addition to a strange powder inside those jars, maybe it's toxic, I won't take it ...
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveB.2: It's a piece of a fossilized creature's skeleton. Gunther might know what creature this was, perhaps I should report this to him?
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveB.3: It's a skull of a fossilized creature, it's catastrophically big!
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveB.4: It's a skull of a fossilized creature!
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveB.5: Is This Really Water? It seems, but it's Pink!
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveB.6: This water seems to be frozen, but it moves very quickly, how strange!
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveB.7: This lava is very hot, better not even get close.
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveB.10: There are a lot of coal chunks here.
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveB.12: This water is very crystalline, I will drink a little ...
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveB.13: It's a ripped backpack, it gives me chills ...
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveB.15: Another heap of things! There are barrels, crystals, jars, pillars, stones, a backpack, screws and pieces of random things ... these monsters don't know how to organize things ?!
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveB.16: There's a lot of stuff heaped here, barrels full of strange liquid, shiny crystals, decaying bones, a lost mine cart and even a torn backpack ...
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveB.17: It's a big pillar, but it looks like a benches ...
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveB.18: The water evaporates as soon as it enters the surface of the lava, I think that's why it is so humid here!
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveB.20: It looks like an alter. It's broken, though.
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveB.24: There are several pieces fallen from a wall ...
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveB.29: The plaque is too worn to read ...
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveC.1: This water is very crystalline, I will drink a little ...
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveC.2: It is a very beautiful tree, but it is not so special, because here there are many of it ...
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveC.3: This bush is full of cobwebs...
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveC.4: It's a rock full of moss ...
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveC.5: There are a lot of coals here ...
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveC.6: A dead fire, I wonder who made it ...
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveC.9: The bones of an unknown creature.
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveC.10: That are several sparkling multicolored jars and with incredible designs, in addition to a strange powder inside those jars, maybe it's toxic, I won't take it ...
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveD.1: !DANGEROUS! DO NOT CONTINUE HERE, HAZARDOUS PLACE, RADIOACTIVE CRYSTALS, LOW OXYGEN ATMOSPHERE!
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveD.2: Empty Minecart, doesn't seem to lead anywhere...
Entries.DTZ.GasStation.1: It's a sign displaying the gas prices at this gas station.
Entries.DTZ.GasStation.2: It's a Joja gas truck. It carries fuel.
Entries.DTZ.GasStation.3: An abandoned home lays here to rot. You hear creaking boards from inside.
Entries.DTZ.GasStation.4: "Here lies Joao"... You have no idea who Joao is.
Entries.DTZ.GasStation.5: Joja brand beans. They are just normal beans.
Entries.DTZ.GasStation.9: "Here lies Y-ri"... This tomb looks well worn.
Entries.DTZ.GasStation.10: Better not come close, it looks like there's a dog, or some other wild animal in there.
Entries.DTZ.JojaMini.1: Aw, they don't sell kupo nuts here. Kupo!
Entries.DTZ.JojaMini.2: I can't reach this red cabbage! It's the only one that doesn't look rotten!!
Entries.DTZ.JojaCEO.1: It's a billiards table. The fabric has worn slightly from use.
Entries.DTZ.JojaCEO.2: Kristoff is showing off his wealth with this statue.
Entries.DTZ.JojaCEO.3: It's locked, there must be important things there.
Entries.DTZ.JojaCEO.6: 'How I Conquered Every Market' By Kristoff Joja
Entries.DTZ.JojaCEO.9: The huge TV is not turned on.
Entries.DTZ.JojaCEO.10: A note nearby reads 'Stop trying to break into my vault. Sincerely, Kristoff.'
Entries.DTZ.JojaCEO.11: 'The Map Maker Has Run Out of Funny Book Names' ... Kristoff sure does like to break the 4th wall.
Entries.DTZ.JojaCEO.12: 'How to Use Nexus Mods'... wait, am I breaking the 4th wall here?
Entries.DTZ.JojaCEO.13: 'How to Setup a Discord Server' Huh? Why would Kristoff Joja need a Discord server?!
Entries.DTZ.JojaCEO.14: 'How to Mod Stardew Valley'.... wait a minute..
Entries.DTZ.JojaHQ.1: Er, can I help you? You don't look very important, so... I don't know, go sit down, or something.
Entries.DTZ.JojaHQ.2: The laptop screen is covered with tabs promoting Joja products.
Entries.DTZ.JojaHQCafe.1: Wait... Am I on the wrong floor?
Entries.DTZ.JojaHQCafe.2: I need the caffeine to keep my energy up!
Entries.DTZ.JojaHQCafe.4: I only ordered this soda, I ain't hungry.
Entries.DTZ.JojaHQCafe.6: The door is locked. A sign on the door reads 'EMPLOYEES ONLY'.
Entries.DTZ.JojaHQCafe.10: This burger is delicious! ..huh? I didn't order it here...
Entries.DTZ.JojaHQOffices.1: It's my allocated break time. I have 5 minutes to eat my lunch. I'm wasting it all, talking to you!!
Entries.DTZ.JojaHQOffices.2: It's an ATM. You can't make a withdrawal because you don't have a bank account.
Entries.DTZ.JojaHQOffices.3: You try to talk to them but they stare at the screen, focused on... nothing.
Entries.DTZ.JojaHQOffices.4: What? What do you want? Do I have to report you to Kristoff?
Entries.DTZ.JojaHQOffices.6: Erm, are you supposed to be back here?
Entries.DTZ.JojaHQOffices.7: You try to talk to them but they stare at the screen, focused on... nothing.
Entries.DTZ.JojaHQOffices.8: This person appears to be dead.
Entries.DTZ.JojaHQOffices.9: Kristoff Joja sits up there in his big office all day, doing nothing. And what do I get? A measly paycheck?
Entries.DTZ.JojaHQOffices.10: This person's eyes are glazed over. They seem as if they're not even here.
Entries.DTZ.JojaHQOffices.11: Hey, didn't you use to work here?
Entries.DTZ.JojaHQOffices.14: You try to talk to them but they stare at the screen, focused on... nothing.
Entries.DTZ.JojaHQOffices.15: This person is using Joja WiFi to browse their social medias... Wait, do they even work here?
Entries.DTZ.JojaHQOffices.16: You try to talk to them but they stare at the screen, focused on... nothing.
Entries.DTZ.JojaHQOffices.17: Have you been to the Sanctuary yet? I go there sometimes. It's nice.
Entries.DTZ.JojaHQOffices.18: The sign reads: '2 - CEO Office, 1 Cafe, G - Ground Floor.' This is floor directions for the elevator.
Entries.DTZ.JojaHQElevHall.5: It's locked, there must be important things there.
Entries.DTZ.JojaHQElevHall.6: This plant is very big and beautiful.
Entries.DTZ.JojaHQElevHall.7: The bin has Joja brand wrappers for various things inside it.
Entries.DTZ.JojaHQElevHall.9: A Joja machine, seems to be pretty new.
Entries.DTZ.TrainStation.1: The Joja Cola machine is broken.
Entries.DTZ.TrainStation.2: Erm, you can just step onto the train. Return tickets are free.
Entries.DTZ.TrainStation.3: That dang Joja Cola machine is broken. I guess I'll just have to wait...
Entries.DTZ.TrainStation.4: The Zuzu Forest is so peaceful. It's a shame I can't visit it much because of work.
Entries.DTZ.TrainStation.5: The bin lid is stuck. Can you help me?
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveHouse.1: A basket with cobwebs inside, along with some insects...
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveHouse.2: A recycling bin with leftover food lying down.
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveHouse.4: An old two-burner stove. It's broken.
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveHouse.5: A sink, dripping small drops of water.
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveHouse.7: 'How to Smith Your Own Sword' By Krobus.
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveHouse.8: A large iron axe with a wooden handle.
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveHouse.9: A table with a paper. Written on it: Dear Diary, T-day it's very c-ld here.. Sev--al slim-s began to ap-ear. I'm sc--ed. My s-ord -s too d-mag-d to f-ght! I th-nk I w-ll j-st h--e -o r-n... G--dbye.
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveHouse.10: A bookcase full of broken bottles and ripped books.
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveHouse.11: A dresser, with old clothes inside.
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveHouse.12: Some rare magical items. How did the owner of this house get them? ...and why do some of them shine purple?
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveHouse.13: The book is heavily worn, but this is what you can make out: T- m-ke a s-i-e ba-r--r y-u m-st u-e t-e fo-l-owi-g: Pr-s--tic s-ard, Ic- cr-st-l, Galv-nise-d b--ts, Eme--ld ne-k-ace. C-mbi-e i- a rit-al.
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveHouse.14: A stone axe with a patched wooden handle.
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveHouse.15: A clock, it seems the only thing that is intact in this house.
Entries.DTZ.OasisCaveHouse.16: A sword and other tools with an anvil, probably to fix them.
Entries.DTZ.Crossroads.3: I've heard that the DJ is taking requests. Just walk up to them on stage and talk to them. I'm sure they'll play the song you choose...
Entries.DTZ.Crossroads.4: Have you been here before? It's lively inside...
Entries.DTZ.Crossroads.5: I'm never gonna get in at this rate!
Entries.DTZ.Crossroads.6: Have you met the Zuzu City Bruisers?#...I'm not supposed to talk about them.
Entries.DTZ.Crossroads.7: Huh? You're a friend of Mr Qi's? Go right in.
Entries.DTZ.SancInt.2: Even strong guys like me need to wind down.
Entries.DTZ.SancInt.3: Have you been near the toilet that's out of order? There's something really strange over there...
Entries.DTZ.SancInt.4: A pumpkin? Seriously? I said bring food, not a big orange ball...
Entries.DTZ.SancInt.6: The Sanctuary is a really fitting name. It's a nice warm place, sheltered from the barren desert.
Entries.DTZ.SancInt.7: Damn, my luck for love sure is low.
Entries.DTZ.SancInt.11: The band playing is great, right?
Entries.DTZ.SancInt.12: I love the atmosphere in here!
Entries.DTZ.SancInt.13: My son? Oh, he's at kindergarten, don't worry about him.
Entries.DTZ.SancInt.14: David is a nice guy, he gives me free snacks sometimes.
Entries.DTZ.SancInt.16: Have you met the owner, David?
Entries.DTZ.SancInt.17: I love this old place.#It's a nice break from the hustle and bustle of the city!
Entries.DTZ.SancInt.18: It's a lovely kitchen - nice and clean.
Entries.DTZ.SancInt.19: The tables are prepped with yummy food for the customers!
Entries.DTZ.SancInt.20: It's a bin ...what else do you want me to say?
Entries.DTZ.DavidRoom.1: It's some type of cooking book...
Entries.DTZ.DavidRoom.2: The books are all about adventuring and combat tactics.
Entries.DTZ.DavidRoom.3: It's a grey backpack. You'd peek inside but there's a lock covering the latch.
Entries.DTZ.DavidRoom.4: 'How to Fix a Clock'...this one seems to have pages ripped out due to pure rage.
Entries.DTZ.DavidRoom.5: 'How to Start a Business'...this one seems to have worn slightly, from use.
Entries.DTZ.DavidRoom.6: The clock seems to have stopped ticking. It's a shame.
Entries.DTZ.DavidRoom.7: 'How to Download Stardew Valley for Free'...HEY! This one shouldn't be here...
Entries.DTZ.DavidRoom.8: 'How to Read'... this one seems counterintuitive.
Entries.DTZ.DavidRoom.9: 'Stop looking in David's bins, for Yoba's sake!
Entries.DTZ.DavidRoom.10: In the pictures are two men. One of the men has blue-ish skin.
Entries.DTZ.DavidRoom.11: You attempt to climb the ladder but the hatch at the top is locked.
Entries.DTZ.DavidRoom.12: It's filled with delicious food, a lot of it just leftovers.
Entries.DTZ.Forest.1: A dilapidated train carriage, off the track. It's covered in graffiti, terrible!
Entries.DTZ.Forest.2: An abandoned Joja truck, likely parked up here, and then covered un graffiti later...
Entries.DTZ.Forest.3: A sign indicating the nearby train station.
Entries.DTZ.Forest.4: A sign advertising Joja Cola to passengers of the trains that pass through here.
Entries.DTZ.Forest.5: A small motor, possibly used to pump water or power.
Entries.DTZ.Forest.6: A parked motorcycle, leaning beside the abandoned train carriage.
Entries.DTZ.Forest.8: A pitcher of plants on top of a square wooden table.
Entries.DTZ.Forest.11: The meat looks delicious. Too bad it was abandoned here.
Entries.DTZ.Forest.12: Apiaries, furnaces and barrels have been set up here. It looks like they were left here, will the owner come back?
Entries.DTZ.Forest.13: Plenty of plants in this garden box. They look like they were looked after well.
Entries.DTZ.Forest.14: A scarecrow to protect the nearby plants.
Entries.DTZ.Forest.15: An abandoned building. Looks like it used to be a Sawmill. It's for sale, too.
Entries.DTZ.TrainStn.1: The Joja Cola machine is broken.
Entries.DTZ.TrainStn.2: Erm, you can just step onto the train. Return tickets are free.
Entries.DTZ.TrainStn.3: That dang Joja Cola machine is broken. I guess I'll just have to wait...
Entries.DTZ.TrainStn.4: The Zuzu Forest is so peaceful. It's a shame I can't visit it much because of work.
Entries.DTZ.TrainStn.5: The bin lid is stuck. Can you help me?
Entries.DTZ.NightClub.3: HAVE YOU BEEN DOWN TO THAT VIP AREA? THE BOUNCER WOULDN'T LET ME IN.
Entries.DTZ.NightClub.4: I'm only having a little break. I'll swig some cider then I'm BACK TO BOOGIEING! YEAH!
Entries.DTZ.NightClub.5: I LOVE THE SINGER! WHO IS IT?
Entries.DTZ.NightClub.6: I FEEL BAD FOR THE NEIGHBOURS, BUT WHO CARES?!
Entries.DTZ.NightClub.7: THE DJ IS AMAZING! I HEARD HE TAKES REQUESTS! IF YOU HAVE A SONG, GO AND ASK HIM!
Entries.DTZ.NightClub.8: *hic* WHAT? I CAN'T HEAR YOU! *hic* NO, I'M FINE.
Entries.DTZ.NightClub.10: WOOO! I LOVE IT IN HERE!
Entries.DTZ.NightClub.11: MMM, time to get my boogie on!
Entries.DTZ.NightClub.12: I wonder if I could talk to... a girl!
Entries.DTZ.NightClub.14: ...what? Am I not allowed to dance alone in a corner? Sorry...
Entries.DTZ.NightClub.15: Too... many... shots... I think I'm starting to see blue chickens...
Entries.DTZ.NightClub.16: Zuzu Underground is just... amazing. Go to the bar and order their 'Zuzu Signature Cocktail'. Trust me, you won't regret it!
Entries.DTZ.NightClub.17: Me? Oh... I only come here for the alcohol. Not much into dancing.
Entries.DTZ.NightClub.21: Don'tcha just love it down here?
Entries.DTZ.NightClub.22: A friend of Qi's, you say? ...okay, in you go.
Entries.DTZ.NightClub.24: Good day, sir. How are you on this fine day?
Entries.DTZ.NightClub.25: Hey, what's up. You're a VIP? I wouldn't have thought it...
Entries.DTZ.NightClub.26: I like to dance to the music over here, where it's a little quieter.
Entries.DTZ.NightClubEntrance.1: Oh, hey! I like to come to the Zuzu Underground Club sometimes when the shop isn't very busy.
Entries.DTZ.Blockparty.1: They are having a conversation about the clown.
Entries.DTZ.Blockparty.2: The clown doesn't look very enthusiastic.
Entries.DTZ.Blockparty.3: They're all dancing and having fun!
Entries.DTZ.Blockparty.4: These people don't look very interested in the party.
Entries.DTZ.Blockparty.5: I wish I had the courage to go and dance... there's a girl over there that I like!
Entries.DTZ.Blockparty.6: They're enjoying the delicious array of food available.
Entries.DTZ.Blockparty.7: I'm not particularly interested in the party. I'm just here to make sure my daughter stays out of trouble!
Entries.DTZ.Blockparty.9: I like to travel around. This festival is always on my list every year.
Entries.DTZ.Blockparty.10: The girls are chatting. You don't really want to disturb them.
Entries.DTZ.Blockparty.12: I'm not bothered about the party. I'm just here for the music. The band is awesome.
Entries.DTZ.Blockparty.13: Ugh... the blue chickens are back...
Entries.DTZ.Blockparty.14: Xena seems to be enjoying the party.
Entries.DTZ.Blockparty.16: Why am I looking through a telescope in the day? I don't know.
Entries.DTZ.Permit.1: And the next step is to...
Entries.DTZ.Permit.3: A TV. It is flicking through many interesting programs.
Entries.DTZ.Permit.4: A water dispenser offering free water.
Entries.DTZ.Permit.5: A waste paper basket with crumpled notes and empty cups of water.
Entries.DTZ.Permit.6: Sorry, I'm on the phone. Could you excuse me?
Entries.DTZ.Permit.7: Hey. Have you ever been to the Zuzu Underground?
Entries.DTZ.Permit.9: They should have a vending machine in here... I'm starving!
Entries.DTZ.Permit.10: A sign reads that this desk is desk 1A. It is currently occupied.
Entries.DTZ.Permit.11: A sign reads that this desk is desk 1B. It is currently occupied.
Entries.DTZ.Permit.12: A sign reads that this desk is desk 1C. It isn't occupied currently.
Entries.DTZ.Permit.13: Several pamphlets and other informative notices are taped to the wall.
Entries.DTZ.Permit.14: The door is locked. A sign reads 'Back entrance. Employees only.'
Entries.DTZ.Permit.15: A coffee maker. It is still steaming, and the coffee pot is still filled to the brim.
Entries.DTZ.North.1: You have no reason to enter the airport yet, but you feel hopeful that you might in the future.
Entries.DTZ.North.2: It's a sign indicating the parking lot for the airport.
Entries.DTZ.North.3: The building seems to be boarded up - best to stay away.
Entries.DTZ.East.1: A sign is stuck to the door; 'TEMPORARY CLOSURE! WE WILL BE BACK SOON!'.
Entries.DTZ.East.2: A plaque reads:^'Mantleby's^From our family to yours!'
Entries.DTZ.General.1: This is a mailbox for the 'Ferngill Postal Service'.
Entries.DTZ.Pharmacy.1: Joja Cough Syrup: Fight off that winter flu!
Entries.DTZ.Pharmacy.3: A brand of headache medicine. Judging by the side-effects, you'd say it would CAUSE headaches.
Entries.DTZ.Pharmacy.4: Super Awesome Magic Red Pills!#(You feel in control while looking at them.)
Entries.DTZ.Pharmacy.9: Super Awesome Magic Blue Pills!#(You feel your control start to slip away while looking at them.)
Entries.DTZ.Pharmacy.5: This cream appears to treat some rare kind of spots.
Entries.DTZ.Pharmacy.8: 'All-purpose Vitamin Pills!#NOTE: Contains parsnips, iron ore, bananas and eggs.'#... what the?
Entries.DTZ.Pharmacy.10: Some very nicely coloured hair ties.
Entries.DTZ.Pharmacy.13: You don't think this one is legal.
Entries.DTZ.Pharmacy.15: 'Prismatic Gel-ly' Hair Gel: with prismatic jelly extract.
Entries.DTZ.Pharmacy.18: The door is locked. This is the pharmacy's medicine storage.
Entries.DTZ.Pharmacy.19: I'm here to get some cough syrup for my throat.
Entries.DTZ.Builders.1: The door is locked. Probably goes upstairs.
Entries.DTZ.Builders.2: The crate is labelled 'Brick Shipment no156532'.
Entries.DTZ.Builders.3: The crate is labelled 'Wood Shipment no137319'.
Entries.DTZ.Builders.4: The crate is labelled 'Concrete Compounds noAB3'.
Entries.DTZ.Builders.5: The fridge is filled with beer and other cold beverages.
Entries.DTZ.Builders.6: This man seems to be hard at work, chopping some wood.
Entries.DTZ.Bakery.1: Row after row of delicious cakes are lined up.
Entries.DTZ.Bakery.3: It's locked. Perhaps it goes through to a larger kitchen.
Entries.DTZ.1c.1: 'A History of Ferngill' by K. Lantern.
Entries.DTZ.1c.2: 'Zuzu News Archives'. It's a book filled with all the old newspapers from the past 10 years or so.
Entries.DTZ.1c.4: 'Gadgets of Time Past' by -------. The author's name has been redacted.
Entries.DTZ.1c.5: 'Dwarfs: Fallacy, Folklore, or True Race?' by S. Kell.
Entries.DTZ.1c.6: 'A Brief History of Modern Medicines' by Dr. Jens Klopp.
Entries.DTZ.1c.7: 'Doc 101: How to Pass Your MD' by H.L.
Entries.DTZ.1c.8: A collection of murder mystery books. They look untouched.
Entries.DTZ.1c.10: It's Buddy and Selena as kids. They're laughing and smiling at the camera.
Entries.DTZ.Airport.1: The man's blocking the ticket booth.
Entries.DTZ.Airport.2: Hey, what can I help with?#Ticket booths are over on the left.
Entries.DTZ.ResortSouth.1: It's a parasol for keeping in the shade.
Entries.DTZ.ResortSouth.2: A large pile of wooden rubble blocks the path. You feel hopeful that this will be cleared soon.
Entries.DTZ.Waterway.1: It's locked. A note attached to the door says 'Out for lunch.'
Entries.DTZ.Waterway.3: There's no reason to go into the hotel yet.
Entries.DTZ.Waterway.4: This place isn't as... blocky as my usual one.#At least I have my trusty diamond glasses!
Entries.DTZ.Pizzeria.1: It's a menu of sorts displaying info about Gio's signature pizza.
Entries.DTZ.Pizzeria.2: It's a menu of sorts displaying info about the restaurant's pasta and spaghetti.
Entries.DTZ.Pizzeria.3: It's possible this leads outside, or perhaps to an upstairs area.#You wouldn't know, however, as the door is locked.
Entries.DTZ.Pizzeria.4: The fridge is filled with various ingredients.#There's a note stuck to the sauce reading 'SECRET SAUCE'.
Entries.DTZ.Pizzeria.5: The pizza oven is roaring hot, with visible flames.
Entries.DTZ.Pizzeria.6: The microwave seems untouched. It appears that everything in this restaurant is made fresh.
Entries.DTZ.Pizzeria.8: It's a wet floor sign. Better look out for spillages.
Entries.DTZ.Pizzeria.9: It's a crate, full of coal for the pizza oven.
Entries.DTZ.PizzeriaBack.1: Stacks and stacks of crates lay in the back room for storage.
Entries.DTZ.PizzeriaBack.2: The door's locked. It probably just goes out back to a delivery or trash area.
Entries.DTZ.PizzeriaBack.3: All of the un-needed furniture is stored back here, it seems.
Entries.DTZ.PizzeriaBack.4: This corridor is very tight and small.#At least there's a cute little painting!
Entries.DTZ.PizzeriaBack.5: It's a fridge for storing drinks, both Joja Cola, and some normal healthy drinks too.
Entries.DTZ.Gio.1: It's a coffee maker.#Giovanni can't survive without his morning coffee.
Entries.DTZ.Gio.2: 'Pizza Secrets From Afar' by Mario Piponini.
Entries.DTZ.Gio.3: It's a little CRT box TV, faintly showing an old black and white film.#It hardly works.
Entries.DTZ.Gio.4: The shelf is full of old cooking memorabilia:#Gio's old chef hat,#a chef's apron,#some kind of cooking award,#and a pizza-shaped trophy for 'Best Pizzeria XXXX'.#For some odd reason, the year has been carved off.
Entries.DTZ.MaxHouse.3: Some fresh cookies lay on the table.
Entries.DTZ.MaxHouse.4: There's a cheap TV set and an old game console.
Entries.DTZ.MaxHouse.5: It's an old picture of Max and his Dad.
Entries.DTZ.MaxHouse.6: Maybe Max dabbles in the keyboard a bit?
Entries.DTZ.MaxHouse.7: There's a pile of paperwork that needs filling out.
Entries.DTZ.MaxHouse.8: Max's computer.#You'd imagine it's for doing all of that unpaid intern work!
Entries.DTZ.MaxHouse.9: The window overlooks the busy waterside street.
Entries.DTZ.HazelHouse.1: Hazel's computer.#It's perfect for college work!
Entries.DTZ.HazelHouse.2: A dusty old TV set. It appears untouched.
Entries.DTZ.HazelHouse.3: The kitchen looks well used - a waitress, and a chef!
Entries.DTZ.HazelHouse.4: A pretty painting of a purple forest.
Entries.DTZ.HazelHouse.6: It's a portrait of Hazel and Giovanni.
Entries.DTZ.University.1: There's a lot of parking ticket machines here.
Entries.DTZ.University.2: Looks like this is where students and professors pay for their parking.
Entries.DTZ.University.3: Looks like these spots are all reserved!
Entries.DTZ.University.4: It's a sign for the Zuzu University.#This is where people from all over the Ferngill Republic come for tip-top education.
Entries.DTZ.University.5: There must be an ongoing game of Chess.#You decide to leave the board be.
Entries.DTZ.University.6: Looks like a nice little picnic site.#Bet it's lovely in the summer!
Entries.DTZ.University.7: It's a noticeboard for important school events.
Entries.DTZ.University.8: A dumpster and some rubbish sit right beside the pristine University...#It's almost a shame, really...
Entries.DTZ.University.9: 'No Ball Games'#Seems harsh...#Though, you wouldn't want anyone to damage the University.
Entries.DTZ.ResortCentral.1: A giant fallen log blocks your path.^It's huge, there's no possible way to shift it whatsoever.
Entries.DTZ.ResortCentral.2: The door is locked.^Attached to the handle, a small note reads:^'If you're reading this, I'm away on a trip!'^'You can still buy stuff from the Resort Shop (I trust you all to pay...) but you won't be able to book a cabin until I'm back.'^- Velma (and Viki)
Entries.DTZ.ResortCentral.3: The door is locked. You can't book a cabin until Velma is back from her trip (in a future update).
Entries.DTZ.ResortCentral.4: It's for booking a cabin, but you can't book a cabin until Velma is back from her trip (in a future update).

Entries.DTZ.GoSeeBuilderMail: Hello, @!^I heard you bought that old sawmill in the Zuzu Forest. Head down to my shop in the city and I can help you fix that place up.^      - Bill%action AddQuest 85870001%%
